analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika āsava āsava sampayutta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsavam ca iva āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigha

original: āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva
analyzed: āsavam ca iva āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsavañca ca eva

original: āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsava sampayuttam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
